resource.description: The ``AWS::ApiGateway::BasePathMapping`` resource creates a base path that clients who call your API must use in the invocation URL.

properties.name: BasePath
properties.description: The base path name that callers of the API must provide as part of the URL after the domain name.

type.description: The base path name that callers of the API must provide as part of the URL after the domain name.

properties.name: DomainName
properties.description: The domain name of the BasePathMapping resource to be described.

type.description: The domain name of the BasePathMapping resource to be described.

properties.name: RestApiId
properties.description: The string identifier of the associated RestApi.

type.description: The string identifier of the associated RestApi.

properties.name: Stage
properties.description: The name of the associated stage.

type.description: The name of the associated stage.
